DataElement.preferredName: Patient Off Treatment Off Study Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the patient went off treatment or off study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Off Treatment Off Study Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._When a patient is not receiving therapy they are considered off treatment.  In clinical trials, a dosing schedule may require a patient to stop medication for a period of time, then resume, such as 28 days on and 7 days off._No longer participating in a study; not being followed and will not be retreated._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: When a patient is not receiving therapy they are considered off treatment.  In clinical trials, a dosing schedule may require a patient to stop medication for a period of time, then resume, such as 28 days on and 7 days off.:No longer participating in a study; not being followed and will not be retreated.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: When a patient is not receiving therapy they are considered off treatment.  In clinical trials, a dosing schedule may require a patient to stop medication for a period of time, then resume, such as 28 days on and 7 days off.
No longer participating in a study; not being followed and will not be retreated.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Workflow and Registration Status Changed per Brenda Duggan; 05.16.18 Concept updated and reversioned EL 12/29/2021 Definition revised LF 01/27/2022

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Date patient came off protoco
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date patient came off protocol therapy or off study prior to receiving any protocol treatment post Callback:
